text: Stephen Dod (March 7, 1770 – March 22, 1855) was an American politician who served as the Mayor of Newark from 1844 to 1845. ==References== Category:1770 births Category:1855 deaths Category:Mayors of Newark, New Jersey Category:New Jersey Whigs Category:19th-century American politicians Category:People from Mendham Township, New Jersey
title: Stephen Dod
